patterns: What kinds of items are there?
What items are available for purchase?
Can you tell me about your product selection?
responses: We offer a wide range of products including electronics, clothing, accessories, and more.
Our product selection includes electronics, clothing, accessories, and more.Feel free to browse through our website to explore the complete range.
We sell a diverse selection of products, including clothing, electronics, furniture, kitchen appliances, sports equipment, and much more.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
Can I pay with credit card?
responses: We accept VISA, Mastercard and American Express.
We accept various payment methods, including credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express).
You can pay using major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express).

patterns: When do I get my delivery?
When will I receive my order?
responses: Delivery could vary based on your locations. So please track your delivery from ordertracking page.
You can view it from order tracking page.
Your selected products can be shown through order tracking page.

patterns: How can I return a product?
I want to refund my order?
responses: You can use refund form in Refund Form page to apply refunds. The refrence code you see can be taken from your orders page.

patterns: Tell me about the developers of kinam?
responses: Kinam was developed by a group of NCIT members: Abhishek Thapa, Abhas Kumar Jha, Ankit Singh & Evan Pradhan. You can contact them through NCIT college.

patterns: How to post to sell my items?
What are the procedure to being a seller?
How to be be a seller?
responses: You can fill the form provided on C2C post page.

patterns: How much authentic is C2C prodcuts?
How to talk with the seller?
responses: Altough Kinam won't be responsible selling or buying for C2C products, we support chatting between the customer. Please send request to chat first to chat with the seller.
